scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack. The attacker leverages a series of carefully crafted inputs to infer protected attributes like income and address details.
initial_goal: Evaluate the accuracy of the customer churn prediction model using publicly available datasets.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking:  The model is used to predict customer churn for a large retail bank.  The model is trained on sensitive customer data, including financial information and demographics.
